he heartland flier was an experimental flying machine developed by Nadul DaRoni in his pursuit for purely mechanical flight.
In addition to the air screw and doubles wheel, DaRoni also developed a small single-person winged vehicle. The user would lay flat on the heartboard and strap their hands and feet into the stirrups. By pedalling their feet and sweeping with their arms (as if performing a breaststroke) the fliers wings would flap quickly and forcefully. If used appropriately (and with more than a little luck) the flier would rise and move forwards surprisingly quickly, though it still took a very strong and tireless person to operate without immediately crashing.
Auroras Whole Realms Catalogue offered the doubles wheel built by Nadul DaRoni, valued at 45 gp.
